remarks: The support of an extended function is the same as the original. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-May-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 30-Jun-2019.)
statement:
extmptsuppeq.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
extmptsuppeq.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
extmptsuppeq.z $e |- ( ( ph /\ n e. ( B \ A ) ) -> X = Z ) $.
extmptsuppeq $p |- ( ph -> ( ( n e. A |-> X ) supp Z ) = ( ( n e. B |-> X ) supp Z ) ) $.
$d A n $.
$d B n $.
$d Z n $.
$d n ph $.
